interactions.Alarm:

The user has expressed satisfaction with the assistant's reliable alarm functionality and has provided positive feedback on the gradual sound increase, which he finds more pleasant than jarring alarms. He has also inquired about the possibility of integrating the alarm with smart home devices, such as gradually increasing the bedroom lighting or adjusting the thermostat before the alarm goes off.

While the user's alarm preferences have remained consistent, he has occasionally requested temporary adjustments to the alarm time or sound profile based on specific circumstances, such as early morning flights or appointments. In these instances, he appreciates the assistant's flexibility and ability to make one-time changes without disrupting his regular alarm settings.

Overall, the user values the assistant's simplicity and reliability in managing his weekday morning routine, allowing him to wake up consistently and start his day on time.
